Two things tell me #Bitcoin is poison: 1) people are being really nasty who disagree with me (like liberals often do when they invariably have no cogent argument on the facts) and 2) the populace at large doesn’t easily grasp the concept, which is important.

In all seriousness I bought Apple in the 80’s because I believed in the concept of the simple GUI. IBM and Microsoft at the time were still DOS. I bought stock in a product because I BELIEVED in it. If you believe in @Bitcoin, buy it! I simply don’t believe in it. So, we cool?
